name: HORSAMS (Island Jam 3)
description:
You are one of the greatest magicians of the Universe and you're challenging your power against your rival! Can you defeat him in this epic real time and magical battle?

Play now against your friends on the same device in this REALTIME EPIC CARD BATTLE GAME!

Summon Dragons, Fairies and all the element's wraith to destroy your enemy!

One single mobile device is all you need to enjoy this unique experience.

HOW TO PLAY:

Throw your instant spells to deal damage to your enemy!

Summon creatures to protect you from your enemy's attacks.

Use the items to support you.

Defeat your enemy to win.
